channel.title: [req]Looking For A Render[req]
channel.description:
Hey guys, sorry about the vague subject, but I am in desperate need of help. Me and a friend of mine are making a clan for a gaming community and we are in desperate need of a clan logo. So what I am hoping is that some people would like to be creative and give this a whirl. It can be anything you want it to be, but the letters PiF in the middle of it. Also it would be great if people could get it in a pretty good detail. And then if the people taking this challenge want a little bit more fun, if you could make it look icy and maybe have some icicles or something hanging off the bottom, that would be extremely cool.
Also, can it please be rendered without a background so that way if you let us use one of your creations, it can blend into the background without having a whitebox or something behind it.
Koopa King

item.title: [req]Looking For A Render[req]

item.title: [req]Looking For A Render[req]
item.dc:creator: @jjones10 jjones10
item.description:
@jjones10 wrote:

Go to http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,29.0.html
They do all Graphics related to sigs and stuff. There are a few 3d renders of abstract metal that you might like

Read full topic

item.title: [req]Looking For A Render[req]
item.dc:creator: @koopa_king koopa king
item.description:
@koopa_king wrote:

Like… I was looking for someone to model a logo and then render it… so that way the logo is 3D on the entrance page to the community. And yes I am hoping because I cant really force someone to do this. And yeah… A modeling program like meta, 3ds, or blender (preferably the latter 2).

Read full topic

item.title: [req]Looking For A Render[req]
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

Are you requesting this to be done in a 3D modelling program/photoshop or something else? Also failed to see how logos are related to modelling.

Read full topic
